titleStmt.title: Poems by Mrs. Anne Killigrew.
titleStmt.author: Killigrew, Anne, 1660-1685.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700. To the pious memory of the accomplisht young lady Mrs. Anne Killigrew.

notesStmt.note: "These poems are licensed to be published, Sept. 30, 1685. Ro. L'Estrange"
Reproduction of original in Folger Library.
Ode by Dryden, "To the pious memory of the accomplisht young lady Mrs. Anne Killigrew": p. [5]-[15].
